runCommand.summary: Runs provided command (command does not need slash in the beginning)

getPlayers.summary: Returns array that contains all cogplayers in this world

put.summary: Stores value to key. This storage is not cleared between minecraft restarts. Value must be one of: CogBool, CogString, CogInteger, CogDouble, CogLong

get.summary: Get value by key. This storage is not cleared between minecraft restarts
